page.description: Returns the non-word characters preceding the specified word.
page.prototype: Separation_Characters as C = LEADING(C strings,N word_number)

argument.name: strings
argument.description: A string expression containing words separated by repeating characters.

argument.name: word_number
argument.description: Specifies the word in the Input_String to examine. Numeric

page.discussion: LEADING() returns the characters that separate the word_number word in strings from the previous word.
page.example: leading("now.is the,time", 2) -> "." leading("now.is the,time", 3) -> " " leading("now.is the,time", 4) -> "," leading("now...is,,,,the:::time", 4) -> ":::" leading("now...is,,,,the:::time", 3) -> ",,,,"
